review: I cannot get it to work, there is no phone # to which I can direct my questions and seek assistance. It may not be the Fire Stick but if you don't support your products your product is a problem in my estimate.
author: kathy canchola

review: Excellent easy to install and set up.
author: Thomas C. Jackson

review: Very easy to use. The prime music is better on the firestick rather then on my phone app. It seams like prime movies and music runs very smooth but when you run another app like Netflix I get some buffering. Overall I recommend the firestick.
author: Carlos Padilla

review: I got this for my birthday and it is amazing. It has so many different features and uses and they are all so convenient being able to access them from my tv.
author: Camryn

review: Fast friendly and easy to use.
author: William B Chandler

review: Awesome best purchase on amAzon to date!!
author: John A. Quinones

review: Works great!  Only issue is that if you are on travel, make sure you take the remote as the app doesn't work unless you know how to setup a hotspot with the same wifi info that you had previously setup.  They need to use Bluetooth with you previously synced phone so you can configure the wifi settings without the remote
author: J Shafer

review: It was easy to install, great price
author: Lady DDS "Reading again"
